title: Trouble with the PVP.net Patcher Kernel
body: When ever i click the league icon to go and play it says the PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working and i tried everything to stop it i restarted my computer and i even re installed league of legends and it will not go away i don't know what to do can someone help me

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are typically caused by League not being configured with the right administrative privileges to operate properly. I suggest working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as your next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

You can fix this by running League of Legends in Administrator mode. You can do this by right-clicking the application and click the "Run as Administrator" and League should open normally with the exception of a UAC pop-up which you can click "Yes" to.
